rows.label: qev093006_MSG0030
rows.name:
This floor plan suggests that
this was once the castle's keep.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev093006_MSG0040
rows.name:
The keep...is the king's seat of power.
In other words, it's the heart of these ruins.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev093006_MSG0050
rows.name:
As we've determined, these Skells are
dangerous foes, not to be trifled with.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev093006_MSG0060
rows.name: That said, it's not like we have any other option.[ST:wait ]
